mapper.sql: exam_id, student_id, batch_id, status, start_time, end_time, create_time, score
mapper.select: select count(*) from exam_student where exam_id = #{exam_id} and student_id = #{student_id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_student (exam_id, student_id, batch_id, status, start_time, end_time, create_time, score) values (#{examId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into exam_student
exam_id,
student_id,

status,

end_time,

score,

mapper.update:
update exam_student
batch_id = #{batchId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where exam_id = #{examId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
